mapper.select: select * from i_industy where parentId = 0 order by id asc
select * from i_industy where parentId != 0 order by id asc
select userId,nickName from u_user where parentId = #{parentId}
select count(0) from a_app where appName = #{appName}
select u.parentId from a_app a,u_user u where a.appId = #{appId} and a.userId = u.userId
mapper.update: update a_app set appStatus = #{appStatus} where appId = #{appId}
mapper.insert: insert into a_adspace (spaceId, appId, spaceType, createTime, spaceName, width, height) values (#{spaceId},#{appId},#{spaceType},now(),#{spaceName},#{width},#{height})
mapper.select: select u.parentId,a.appId from a_adspace d,a_app a,u_user u where d.spaceId = #{spaceId} and d.appId = a.appId and a.userId = u.userId

select u.parentId,a.appId,d.spaceId,t.upstreamAppId from a_adspace d,a_app a,u_user u,a_upstream t where t.upstreamId = #{upstreamId} and t.spaceId = d.spaceId and d.appId = a.appId and a.userId = u.userId
mapper.insert: insert into a_upstream (upstreamId, spaceId, upstreamType, upstreamAppId, upstreamPackageName, createTime) values (#{upstreamId},#{spaceId},#{upstreamType},#{upstreamAppId},#{upstreamPackageName},#{createTime})
insert into a_assign (spaceId, upstreamType, probability, type) values (#{spaceId},#{upstreamType},#{probability},1)
mapper.select: select u.*,DATE_FORMAT(u.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as create_Time,t.`name` from a_upstream u,a_upstream_type t where u.spaceId = #{spaceId} and u.upstreamType = t.type
mapper.insert:
insert into a_statistics (spaceId, appId, upstreamId, createTime, beforeLookPV, beforeClickNum, beforeIncome, lookPV, clickNum, clickProbability, income, ecmp) values
(#{item.spaceId},#{item.appId},#{item.upstreamId},#{item.createTime},#{item.beforeLookPV},#{item.beforeClickNum},#{item.beforeIncome},#{item.lookPV},#{item.clickNum},#{item.clickProbability},#{item.income},#{item.ecmp})
mapper.select: select count(0) from a_upstream_type
mapper.insert: insert into a_upstream_type (type, name, shortName, createTime, status) values (#{type},#{name},#{shortName},#{createTime},#{status})
mapper.select: select a.upstreamId,a.upstreamAppId,a.name,p.appId,d.spaceId,d.spaceName,p.appName,s.probability,a.upstreamPackageName from (SELECT u.upstreamId,u.upstreamAppId,t.name,u.upstreamType,u.spaceId,u.upstreamPackageName FROM a_upstream u,a_upstream_type t where u.upstreamType = t.type and u.upstreamId = #{upstreamId}) a LEFT JOIN a_adspace d on a.spaceId = d.spaceId LEFT JOIN a_app p on d.appId = p.appId LEFT JOIN a_assign s on a.spaceId = s.spaceId and a.upstreamType = s.upstreamType
select * from a_upstream where upstreamId = #{upstreamId}
mapper.delete: delete from a_assign where spaceId = #{spaceId} and upstreamType = #{upstreamType}
mapper.select: select r.*,t.`name` as upstreamName from a_report r,a_upstream_type t where r.appId = #{appId} and r.slotId = #{slotId} and TO_DAYS(r.createTime) = TO_DAYS(#{createTime}) and r.upstreamType = t.type
mapper.insert:
insert into report (createTime, adId, adSize, address, adName, lookPv, income, clickNum, ecpm, clickProbability, cpc) values
(#{item.createTime},#{item.adId},#{item.adSize},#{item.address},#{item.adName},#{item.lookPv},#{item.income},#{item.clickNum},#{item.ecpm},#{item.clickProbability},#{item.cpc})
mapper.select:
select *,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d") as createTime2 from report where 1=1
and adId = #{adId}
and TO_DAYS(createTime) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
and TO_DAYS(#{endTime}) >= TO_DAYS(createTime)
order by createTime desc
select a.appName,d.spaceName from a_adspace d,a_app a where d.spaceId = #{spaceId} and d.appId = a.appId
